synopsis.text:
Iga and Kuki clans, under the command of Tokugawa and Hattori, relentlessly pursue Sarutobi Sasuke and his father, Ozaru, after the devastating defeat of their lord, Yukimura Sanada. As the Toyotomi family crumbles following the Winter War, the Sanada ninjas find themselves marked for death, forcing Sasuke and Ozaru into a life on the run.

In this action-packed tale, Sasuke grapples with the darker aspects of human nature while trying to uphold the virtues of loyalty and honor. As a member of the Sarutobi clan, Sasuke must harness his ninja skills and navigate the treacherous world of vengeance and anger that surrounds him.

The story unfolds in the aftermath of the Battle of Sekigahara, where Tokugawa Ieyasu emerges as the new shogun of Japan. Sasuke, a young ninja serving the defeated Sanada Daisuke, embarks on a perilous journey of growth and self-discovery, learning to balance the harsh realities of his profession with his own burgeoning humanity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
